comment: She's the best teacher ever in the world. She has changed my life for ever, I wish I would take her class again. I wish could every day for the rest my life. She has done everything for me and I really appreciate her for it.

Ms. Mahal is a great math professor. She will go over any math  problems you have before or after class. She uploads study sheets that are similar to the tests. She is very respectful and cares about you're grades. she replies to emails fast.  If you struggle with math please take her !!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: she is a good professor.. she likes to help students but you have to attent to class, just pay attention to class ad write her notes and you will be fine on tests
Super nice and understanding. Very helpful . Tests are not hard if you do the H.W. and the review sheet . Her grading scale is very helpful . Take her

This class is not a walk in the park. Professor Mahal is not a good teacher if you need a lot of guidance in math. She's very kind, but her class is very hard and she is confusing. Lessons are confusing and tests are even worse, MAN, the test problems ARE THE WORST! they're 20x's harder than necessary. DO NOT take this class if math isn't for you.
